text: Osman Ferhan Şensoy (26 February 1951 – 31 August 2021) was a Turkish actor, playwright and director. He was born in Çarşamba, Turkey. He was known for his roles in Son Ders: Aşk ve Üniversite (2008), Pardon (2005) and Şans Kapıyı Kırınca (2004). Şensoy died from heart failure and respiratory failure on 31 August 2021 in Istanbul at the age of 70. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1951 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Turkish movie actors Category:Turkish stage actors Category:Turkish television actors Category:Theatre directors Category:Turkish playwrights
title: Ferhan Şensoy
